parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_count
parameters.description: Number of configurations in the part or assembly

title: IBody2.IRemoveMaterialProperty
description: Removes the material property values (e.g., color) from the body in the specified configurations in parts and assemblies.
signature:
System.Boolean IRemoveMaterialProperty( 
   System.Int32
Config_opt
,
   System.Int32
Config_count
,
   ref System.String
Config_names
)

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_count
parameters.description: Number of configurations in the part or assembly

returns: True if the material is removed from the body, false if not
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IModelDoc2::GetConfigurationCount
to get the value for Config_Count.
